title: Kay Dee Designs F0792 Dog Welcome Embroidered Waffle Towel
description: Great for dog lovers! this humorous waffle towel features large, meticulous embroidery, a convenient loop for hanging, and thick waffle weave. The waffle weave makes this towel absorbent, and the embroidery makes it a personal statement for your kitchen, or a meaningful gift! Kay Dee Designs has been selling textiles for a well-dressed kitchen since 1951
